posts.name:
Ryan Musselman
Ryan Musselman
posts.content:
2024 was a breaking point for me.

I started posting less so I could grow more. 

I was frantically playing the LinkedIn growth game and the echo chamber of LinkedIn pros had me drowning in endless advice:

- "Have a Do-it-Yourself offer!"
- "Have a Done with You offer!"
- "Have a Done for You offer!"

and "MuSt-Do-or-yOu-will-f4iL-bro" tasks 

I was a clock with no hands.
Constantly ticking but:
Marking nothing.

So I cut back and minimalized everything:

- ONE offer
- ONE niche audience
- ONE monthly workshop

Here's the crazy part:

This minimalist approach hit $551K in 2024. I've dialed-in so well that I hit my first 6-figure week in 2025.

I have 1 offer.
Not 2.
Not 3.
Not 5.
1.

Most coaches are like busy chefs trying to:

Figure out 12 special dishes at once.
Stretched thin. Stressed out.
Gasping for a big win.

But you only needed ONE signature dish. When I realized this and:

- Crafted 1 offer for 1 target niche (coaches)...
- Promoted it inside 1 free monthly workshop
- And made it into 1 conversion protocol

Then I found that success hides in subtraction, not addition. And when you experience this, then you get:

- The courage to go narrow
- The strength to say no
- The power to simplify

Sometimes the bravest thing you can do is delete your to-do list and start over with just:

ONE thing.

When you get this right, results accelerate.

Why 99% of Coaches should have 1 group coaching offer:

comments.commentText: Very impressive, Ryan! It is a path towards professional and personal fulfillment.

I appreciate your succinct agreement, Dhvani. It often takes a shared perspective to highlight the importance of aligning our professional narratives effectively on LinkedIn. Your insights are always valuable.
lol, lately the high designated players should also realise that care for your employees well being and donâ€™t be their stress

posts.name:
Nikki Lang
Nikki Lang
posts.content:
Had such a blast recording the Differentiated podcast with Chris Ford. 

We go way back to our Clari day's together and when I saw he was starting a podcast showcasing how people are building in their own unique way, I knew I wanted to be involved.

I have never claimed to know what the heck I am doing here on LI or why it seems to be working, but in this episode we try and get to the bottom of it...

What type of posts take off, which one's don't and how I have been able to get over 10M views and (nearly) 8k followers in just 5 months.

Trust me guys, I am just as surprised by all of this as you are!!

I hope I share some insights that are useful to some of you who are building alongside me, cause we are all in this together!

Either way, I had a great time chatting with my old friend and his prep and production value were OUTSTANDING!

Thanks for a great experience and conversation, Chris. Always a pleasure!

-Nik the oversharing podcast guest

OH!! And the full episode drops on Monday! Will share the link then.

comments.commentText: Wow! sounds like a good time
Ronen R. Pessar It was a lot of fun!

posts.name:
Melorine Parsy
Melorine Parsy
posts.content:
Over 70% of ECC Customers havenâ€™t started migrating to S/4HANA. Is time running out?



In 2025, many ECC customers still believe itâ€™s â€œtoo earlyâ€ to migrate to S/4HANA. But letâ€™s look at the reality, and the potential risks of waiting.

As we approach SAPâ€™s 2027 deadline, delaying your migration could bring several challenges:

S/4HANA consulting rates have already increased 25-40% in the last two years. As demand grows, will you be ready for the potential cost spike?

By 2027, the demand for S/4HANA consultants could outpace the supply by 3x, which could make it harder to find qualified experts when the time comes.

Rushed Implementations = Increased Risk

SAP migrations are complex. Postponing could lead to rushed implementations, which might cause:
â†’ Data integrity issues
â†’ Lengthier downtime
â†’ Operational disruptions


Whatâ€™s the Path Forward?

The key is to start planning today, even if full migration isnâ€™t on your priority list yet.

1ï¸âƒ£ Create a Strategic Roadmap
â†’ Assess your current processes
â†’ Set clear budgets and expectations
â†’ Identify trusted migration partners

2ï¸âƒ£ Invest in Change Management
â†’ Engaging your teams early makes the transition smoother
â†’ Helps you maximize the full potential of the migration

3ï¸âƒ£ Consider Hybrid or Phased Approaches
â†’ Moving some systems to the cloud first can simplify the transition
â†’ Reduces complexity and spreads out costs

posts.name:
Helen Yu
Helen Yu
posts.content:
7 years ago, I launched Tigon Advisory Corp. to provide fractional CXO services to startups. A conversational AI startup thrust me into the unknown world of artificial intelligence. Learning AI on my own was quite the adventure back then.

Fast forward to today, I'm thrilled to discover many learning resources for AI and data sciences. However, there aren't many work-ready training offerings until I came across. It has become the go-to destination for many in the field to upskill in AI and data science. Simplilearn's Generative AI for Business Transformation program caught my attention recently.

This 6-month program caters to business leaders, C-suite executives, senior managers, and entrepreneurs looking to stay ahead of the technology curve.
It stands out for several reasons:
 It is designed in collaboration with world-renowned universities and top industry practitioners.
 It covers Generative AI fundamentals, prompt engineering, ChatGPT applications, workflow automation, and AI in software engineering, customer service, data analytics, and product R&D.
 It emphasizes work-ready training through tool demonstration sessions and real-world projects.
 It offers hands-on experience with ChatGPT, Gemini, Zapier, CodeWhisperer & other prominent tools.
 You will earn a certification and alumni association membership to boost your career and expand your network.

You can read unfiltered reviews here:or find Forbes' review here:


For those leaders looking for a structured path to mastering Generative AI's business applications, it's an excellent opportunity to enhance your skills and stay competitive in an evolving technological landscape.

Want to transform your career in the era of AI? The generative AI market is projected to reach $667.9 billion by 2030 and is expected to add $4.4 trillion in value to the global economy each year. These numbers underscore the critical importance of staying ahead in this evolving field.

Check out Simplilearn's Gen AI courses atand use code HELENYU20 for a special New Year discount when you chat with their learning advisor team

Thank you, Jens, for this interesting exchange!!

The global healthcare sector is facing a pivotal moment. Asâ€˜s 2024 ğ˜ğ˜­ğ˜°ğ˜£ğ˜¢ğ˜­ ğ˜ğ˜¦ğ˜¢ğ˜­ğ˜µğ˜©ğ˜¤ğ˜¢ğ˜³ğ˜¦ ğ˜šğ˜¦ğ˜¤ğ˜µğ˜°ğ˜³ ğ˜–ğ˜¶ğ˜µğ˜­ğ˜°ğ˜°ğ˜¬ shows, technological advancements like AI, telemedicine, and wearable health solutions are poised to reshape care delivery, improve patient outcomes, and streamline operations. Yet, rising costs, clinician shortages, and the demand for personalized, accessible care present significant challenges.

Key insights from our study:

ğ—”ğ—¿ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—³ğ—¶ğ—°ğ—¶ğ—®ğ—¹ ğ—œğ—»ğ˜ğ—²ğ—¹ğ—¹ğ—¶ğ—´ğ—²ğ—»ğ—°ğ—² (ğ—”ğ—œ)
Predictive AI models can optimize staffing by forecasting patient volumes, while AI-enabled diagnostics can speed up radiological imaging by up to 60%.

ğ—¦ğ˜‚ğ˜€ğ˜ğ—®ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—®ğ—¯ğ—¶ğ—¹ğ—¶ğ˜ğ˜† & ğ—–ğ—¼ğ˜€ğ˜ ğ— ğ—®ğ—»ğ—®ğ—´ğ—²ğ—ºğ—²ğ—»ğ˜
By 2026, the market for interoperable clinical data is expected to grow from $3.4 billion to $6.2 billion, reflecting a shift toward data-sharing innovations that improve efficiency.

ğ—¥ğ—²ğ—ºğ—¼ğ˜ğ—² ğ—–ğ—®ğ—¿ğ—²
Telehealth and virtual wards have expanded access to services, especially in rural areas, creating new preventive care possibilities at lower costs.

In our ğ˜ğ˜¶ğ˜µğ˜¶ğ˜³ğ˜¦ ğ˜°ğ˜§ ğ˜ğ˜¦ğ˜¢ğ˜­ğ˜µğ˜© study, we outline the opportunities that advanced technologies present for the German healthcare system, depending on political decisions. Against the backdrop of the current discussions on healthcare funding, it is vital to seize these opportunities promptly, as they promise substantial improvements in both efficiency and quality.
